calibrate_probe.docs:
The EC probe have to be calibrated. For this you need know the EC reference value and temperature of the calibration solution.

*See also: [`ufire_ec.calibrate_probe` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#ufire-ec-calibrate-probe-action)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the ufire EC sensor.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#ufire-ec-calibrate-probe-action)*

solution.docs:
**, float**: Solution reference EC value.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#ufire-ec-calibrate-probe-action)*

temperature.docs:
**, float**: Solution current temperature.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#ufire-ec-calibrate-probe-action)*

reset.docs:
Reset the current calibration on the sensor.

*See also: [`ufire_ec.reset` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#ufire-ec-reset-action)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the ufire EC sensor.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#ufire-ec-reset-action)*

address.docs:
**, int**: Specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x3C`.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#configuration-variables)*

ec.docs:
**, [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor)**: Set the EC sensor configuration. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
**, [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor)**: Set the onboard temperature sensor configuration. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature_coefficient.docs:
**, float**: Set the temperature coefficient for the EC sensor. Defaults to `0.019`.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature_compensation.docs:
**, float**: Set the temperature compensation for the EC sensor. Defaults to `21.0`.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature_sensor.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of the temperature sensor. Only needed if the onboard temperature sensor is not used.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [uFire Isolated EC sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ec.html#configuration-variables)*
